recipes.title: Getting Started
recipes.excerpt: Install UI8Kit and create your first semantic component.
recipes.body: Add @ui8kit/core and @ui8kit/template to your project. Use Block, Stack, Title, Text with semantic props. Run the DSL linter to validate.

recipes.title: Props-Driven Approach
recipes.excerpt: How semantic props map to Tailwind classes.
recipes.body: Every prop like gap, p, rounded, bg maps to a whitelisted utility class. No className or style. Use data-class for custom selectors.

recipes.title: DSL Patterns
recipes.excerpt: Use If, Loop, Var for template logic.
recipes.body: Replace .map and ?: with Loop and If. Var wraps dynamic values. This enables stable generation to Liquid, Handlebars, and other engines.
